text: Tyance paigambara punha tyanna mhanale, tyacya mulukhaci spasta nisani hi ahe ki tumacyajavala ti peti parata ye'ila, jicya tumacya palanakartyatarphe manacya santici samagri ahe ani musacya santatine va harunacya santatine apalya mage sodalele samana ahe. Phiraste ti peti ucaluna anatila. Nihsandeha, hi tara tumacyasathi spasta nisani ahe, jara tumhi imana balagata asala
